subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which of the following was the capital of Rajasthan before Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर के पहले राजस्थान के राजधानी कौन था।
explanation_en:
Ajmer was the capital of Rajasthan before Jaipur. It was ruled by the Amber Rajputs before becoming the capital of Marwar kingdom.
